email_text:
Subject: Your Amazon Order #123456789 is Confirmed

Dear [Customer Name],

Thank you for shopping with Amazon! We are pleased to confirm that your order has been successfully placed and is now being processed. Here are the details of your purchase:

Order Number: #123456789
Order Date: [Date]
Estimated Delivery Date: [Estimated Delivery Date]

Order Details:
- Item 1: [Product Name]
  Quantity: 1
  Price: $XX.XX

- Item 2: [Product Name]
  Quantity: 1
  Price: $XX.XX

Subtotal: $XX.XX
Shipping: $X.XX
Total: $XX.XX

Payment Method: [Payment Method]

Shipping Address:
[Shipping Address]

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your order, please feel free to contact us at [Amazon Customer Service Email] or visit our Help & Customer Service page on our website.

Thank you for choosing Amazon. We appreciate your business and hope you enjoy your new purchase.

Sincerely,
Amazon Customer Service Team
